n1: Notify when someone completed a task
n2: Notify when someone skipped a task
n3: Notify when someone joined a queue
n4: Notify when someone temporarily left a queue
n5: Notify when someone left a queue
n6: Notify who was assigned in a queue next

YOUR_TURN: It's now your turn in queue
THEIR_TURN: is now responsible for a queue

welcome text:
Here we aim to help you manage your chores with roommates.

Here's how it works:

üëâ You create a Queue.
üëâ You invite your friends.
üëâ The app will do the rest for you!
circular queues text: ‚Üª Meaning, each person in the Queue will do the chores one by one and after that the Queue starts over.
queues usage text 1:
üò≥ To register progress press the Add Progress button and the system will recognize your contribution.

üòá Even if it's not your turn, the app will count it and skip you the next time it is your turn.
queues usage text 2: üëÜ To join a Queue tap this icon and follow further instructions.
queues usage subtext: ‚ùÑÔ∏è When you're, let's say, leaving for summer, just **Freeze** the Queue. This will save your progress. You can return whenever.
todos text 1:
üîî The one responsible for the chores receives a notification and the task shows in their To-do list.

‚úîÔ∏è When you're shown a task, you should complete it and tap the circle on the right.

ü´° The app will then go on to the next person in the Queue.
todos text 2:
‚ùå Or you can skip the task swiping it to the left if you don't feel like doing it today.

üôÉ Though, do note that you will have to do it twice the next time.
todos text 3:
üî• When a task is preceded by a red dot, it means the task is Urgent!

üëã It becomes Urgent when your roommates Shake you!
todos text 4: You can select multiple todos holding your finger on one of the tasks.
